Protobuf Dependencies

The proto tag controls how protocol buffers are processed.

If you use protocol buffers, you will probably need to depend on protobuf-java. See maven central for the latest release. This plugin uses the protoc-bundled-plugin under the hood, so looking at its central repo listing can help figure out which compilers are available.

<dependencies>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>com.google.protobuf</groupId>
    <artifactId>protobuf-java</artifactId>
    <version>3.0.0</version>
  </dependency>
  ...
</dependencies>

<build>
  <plugins>
    <plugin>
      <groupId>com.google.closure</groupId>
      <artifactId>closure-maven-plugin</artifactId>
      <version>${project.version}</version>
      <executions>
        <execution>
          <goals>
            <goal>generate-closure-sources</goal>
          </goals>
        </execution>
      </executions>
    </plugin>
  </plugins>
</build>
